title: Sonos leaks continue with the upcoming Sub Mini pictured for the first time
content:
The leaky bucket at Sonos is no closer to being fixed up as The Verge reports on yet another new product on the way. Following the leak and subsequent announcement of the Sonos Ray soundbar, the next on the slate is apparently the Sub Mini. As you might be able to guess, it’s a subwoofer. And a

The post Sonos leaks continue with the upcoming Sub Mini pictured for the first time appeared first on XDA.
description: The latest in a recent flood of Sonos leaks is the Sub Mini, a more affordable subwoofer to pair with the Sonos Ray soundbar.
